ScummVM Dumper Companion

Old Macintosh CD-ROMs use HFS, a format that modern operatings systems can't natively handle.

This companion program extracts game data from an HFS disk image and formats it for use in ScummVM. It produces a ZIP file, so it is best used on a desktop computer.

THIS WORKS ENTIRELY IN YOUR WEB BROWSER. NO DATA IS TRANFERRED TO ANY SERVER.
